name: Tablet
description: A solid medicine in tablet form for oral use.

name: Syrup
description: A liquid medicine for oral administration.

name: Capsule
description: A gelatin or plant-based capsule for various medications.

name: Cream
description: A topical medicine for external application.

name: Injection
description: A medicine administered via injection for quick effect.

name: Drop
description: A medicine in drop form for eyes, ears, or nasal use.
